EmailTemplate.subject: What is ASA?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Salt®, powered by the nonprofit American Student Assistance® (ASA) is dedicated to helping people realize their higher education dreams in a financially responsible way.
Salt is a free, nonprofit-backed educational program that helps students like you take control of your student loans and gain money knowledge for college and beyond.
If you have any other questions or concerns, please email us at salt@saltmoney.org.
Thank you,
Call Center Hours: Monday – Thursday: 8:00 a.m. – 8:00 p.m. ET; Friday: 8:00 a.m. – 5:00 p.m. ET
